faqs.text: How did I discover my programer side?
faqs.answer: I've always been a technology lover in general. But, it was in games that I discovered my vocation to be a programmer, I liked to program modifications for games.

faqs.text: What languages ​​do I use to program?
faqs.answer: Currently, I'm focused on Front-end, but I have solid knowledge in Back-end languages ​​like: 'Java', 'Python', 'C#'. I also have knowledge in SQL database.

faqs.text: How is Geraldo Junior in professional environment?
faqs.answer: Although I worked in only one company, I was always praised for my proactivity and willingness to carry out the activities that were assigned to me.

faqs.text: What are my graduations so far?
faqs.answer: I started studying at Faculdade Oswaldo Cruz in 2021 and in my 4th semester, I migrated to UNIP where I am doing my last semester.
